text: John Isner was the three-time defending champion, but lost in the final to Nick Kyrgios, 6–7(3–7), 6–7(4–7). ==Seeds== The top four seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky losers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ==References== *Main draw *Qualifying draw Atlanta Open - Singles BBandT Atlanta Open - Singles 2016 Singles Atlanta
title: 2016 BB&T Atlanta Open – Singles
